name: 李春穎
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意
一維系統的自由及強制振動
多維系統的自由及強制振動
自然頻率的計算與模態分析
振動的控制
振動量測與應用
振動系統之數值分析方法
非線性振動
機構與動力傳動元件的振動分析
Free and Forced vibrations of Single Degree of Freedom Systems, Free and Forced vibrations of Multi-degree of Freedom Systems,  Determination of Natural Frequencies and Mode Shapes, Vibration Control, Vibration Measurement and Applications, Numerical Methods in Vibration Analysis, Non-liner Vibration, Vibration Analysis of Mechanisms and Power Transmission Elements.
schedule:
0. Introduction to Matlab and Simulink(Week 1)
1. Fundamentals of Vibration(Week 1 - 3)
2. Free Vibration of Single-Degree-of-Freedom Systems(Week 4-5)
3. Harmonically Excited Vibration(Week 6-7)
4. Vibration Under General Forcing Conditions(Week 8-10)
5. Two-Degree-of-Freedom Systems(Week 11-12)
7. Determination of Natural Frequencies and Mode Shapes(Week 12-13)
8. Continuous Systems(Week 14-15)
10. Vibration Measurement and Applications(Week 16-17)
